rule.description: GitHub Dependabot alerts new repos disable.
GitHub Dependabot alerts new repos enable.
GitHub Dependabot security updates new repos.
GitHub Dependabot security updates new repos disable.
GitHub Dependabot security updates new repos enable.
GitHub Dependency graph new repos disable.
GitHub Dependency graph new repos enable.
GitHub Enterprise Remove self hosted runner.
GitHub Enterprise Register self hosted runner.
GitHub Enterprise Runner group runner removed.
GitHub Enterprise Runner group runners added.
GitHub Enterprise Runner group runners updated.
GitHub Enterprise Self hosted runner updated.
GitHub Members can create pages enable.
GitHub Members can create pages disable.
GitHub Orgnaization advanced security policy selected member disabled.
GitHub Orgnaization advanced security policy selected member enabled.
GitHub Orgnaization audit log git event export.
GitHub Orgnaization disable member team creation permission.
GitHub Orgnaization disable oauth app restrictions.
GitHub Orgnaization disable two factor requirement.
GitHub Orgnaization display commenter full name enabled.
GitHub Orgnaization enable member team creation permission.
GitHub Orgnaization enable oauth app restrictions.
GitHub Orgnaization enable two factor requirement.
GitHub Orgnaization oauth app access approved.
GitHub Orgnaization oauth app access denied.
GitHub Orgnaization oauth app access requested.
GitHub Orgnaization register self hosted runner.
GitHub Orgnaization remove self hosted runner.
GitHub Orgnaization runner group runner removed.
GitHub Orgnaization runner group runners added.
GitHub Orgnaization runner group runners updated.
GitHub Orgnaization self hosted runner updated.
GitHub Orgnaization set actions retention limit.
GitHub Orgnaization update default repository permission.
GitHub Orgnaization update member repository creation permission.
GitHub Orgnaization update new repository default branch setting.
GitHub Orgnaization update saml provider settings.
GitHub Orgnaization update terms of service.
